00058 btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm::btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm(btPersistentManifold* mf,const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,btSimplexSolverInterface* simplexSolver, btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver* pdSolver,int /* numPerturbationIterations */, int /* minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold */)
00059 : btActivatingCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap),
00060 m_simplexSolver(simplexSolver),
00061 m_pdSolver(pdSolver),
00062 m_ownManifold (false),
00063 m_manifoldPtr(mf),
00064 m_lowLevelOfDetail(false)
00065 {
00066         (void)body0Wrap;
00067         (void)body1Wrap;
00068 }

00073 btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm::~btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm()
00074 {
00075         if (m_ownManifold)
00076         {
00077                 if (m_manifoldPtr)
00078                         m_dispatcher->releaseManifold(m_manifoldPtr);
00079         }
00080 }

00083 {
00084         m_lowLevelOfDetail = useLowLevel;

00089 extern btScalar gContactBreakingThreshold;

00092 //
00093 // Convex-Convex collision algorithm
00094 //
00095 void btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm ::processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00096 {
00097 
00098         if (!m_manifoldPtr)
00099         {
00100                 //swapped?
00101                 m_manifoldPtr = m_dispatcher->getNewManifold(body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00102                 m_ownManifold = true;
00103         }
00104         resultOut->setPersistentManifold(m_manifoldPtr);
00105 
00106         //comment-out next line to test multi-contact generation
00107         //resultOut->getPersistentManifold()->clearManifold();
00108 
00109 
00110         const btConvexShape* min0 = static_cast<const btConvexShape*>(body0Wrap->getCollisionShape());
00111         const btConvexShape* min1 = static_cast<const btConvexShape*>(body1Wrap->getCollisionShape());
00112 
00113         btVector3  normalOnB;
00114         btVector3  pointOnBWorld;
00115 
00116         {
00117 
00118 
00119                 btGjkPairDetector::ClosestPointInput input;
00120 
00121                 btGjkPairDetector       gjkPairDetector(min0,min1,m_simplexSolver,m_pdSolver);
00122                 //TODO: if (dispatchInfo.m_useContinuous)
00123                 gjkPairDetector.setMinkowskiA(min0);
00124                 gjkPairDetector.setMinkowskiB(min1);
00125 
00126                 {
00127                         input.m_maximumDistanceSquared = min0->getMargin() + min1->getMargin() + m_manifoldPtr->getContactBreakingThreshold();
00128                         input.m_maximumDistanceSquared*= input.m_maximumDistanceSquared;
00129                 }
00130 
00131                 input.m_transformA = body0Wrap->getWorldTransform();
00132                 input.m_transformB = body1Wrap->getWorldTransform();
00133 
00134                 gjkPairDetector.getClosestPoints(input,*resultOut,dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw);
00135 
00136                 btVector3 v0,v1;
00137                 btVector3 sepNormalWorldSpace;
00138 
00139         }
00140 
00141         if (m_ownManifold)
00142         {
00143                 resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00144         }
00145 
00146 }
00147

00150 
00151 btScalar        btConvex2dConvex2dAlgorithm::calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* col0,btCollisionObject* col1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00152 {
00153         (void)resultOut;
00154         (void)dispatchInfo;
00156 
00159         btScalar resultFraction = btScalar(1.);
00160 
00161 
00162         btScalar squareMot0 = (col0->getInterpolationWorldTransform().getOrigin() - col0->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
00163         btScalar squareMot1 = (col1->getInterpolationWorldTransform().getOrigin() - col1->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
00164 
00165         if (squareMot0 < col0->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold() &&
00166                 squareMot1 < col1->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold())
00167                 return resultFraction;
00168 
00169 
00170         //An adhoc way of testing the Continuous Collision Detection algorithms
00171         //One object is approximated as a sphere, to simplify things
00172         //Starting in penetration should report no time of impact
00173         //For proper CCD, better accuracy and handling of 'allowed' penetration should be added
00174         //also the mainloop of the physics should have a kind of toi queue (something like Brian Mirtich's application of Timewarp for Rigidbodies)
00175 
00176 
00178         {
00179                 btConvexShape* convex0 = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(col0->getCollisionShape());
00180 
00181                 btSphereShape   sphere1(col1->getCcdSweptSphereRadius()); //todo: allow non-zero sphere sizes, for better approximation
00182                 btConvexCast::CastResult result;
00183                 btVoronoiSimplexSolver voronoiSimplex;
00184                 //SubsimplexConvexCast ccd0(&sphere,min0,&voronoiSimplex);
00186                 btGjkConvexCast ccd1( convex0 ,&sphere1,&voronoiSimplex);
00187                 //ContinuousConvexCollision ccd(min0,min1,&voronoiSimplex,0);
00188                 if (ccd1.calcTimeOfImpact(col0->getWorldTransform(),col0->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),
00189                         col1->getWorldTransform(),col1->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),result))
00190                 {
00191 
00192                         //store result.m_fraction in both bodies
00193 
00194                         if (col0->getHitFraction()> result.m_fraction)
00195                                 col0->setHitFraction( result.m_fraction );
00196 
00197                         if (col1->getHitFraction() > result.m_fraction)
00198                                 col1->setHitFraction( result.m_fraction);
00199 
00200                         if (resultFraction > result.m_fraction)
00201                                 resultFraction = result.m_fraction;
00202 
00203                 }
00204 
00205 
00206 
00207 
00208         }
00209 
00211         {
00212                 btConvexShape* convex1 = static_cast<btConvexShape*>(col1->getCollisionShape());
00213 
00214                 btSphereShape   sphere0(col0->getCcdSweptSphereRadius()); //todo: allow non-zero sphere sizes, for better approximation
00215                 btConvexCast::CastResult result;
00216                 btVoronoiSimplexSolver voronoiSimplex;
00217                 //SubsimplexConvexCast ccd0(&sphere,min0,&voronoiSimplex);
00219                 btGjkConvexCast ccd1(&sphere0,convex1,&voronoiSimplex);
00220                 //ContinuousConvexCollision ccd(min0,min1,&voronoiSimplex,0);
00221                 if (ccd1.calcTimeOfImpact(col0->getWorldTransform(),col0->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),
00222                         col1->getWorldTransform(),col1->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),result))
00223                 {
00224 
00225                         //store result.m_fraction in both bodies
00226 
00227                         if (col0->getHitFraction()      > result.m_fraction)
00228                                 col0->setHitFraction( result.m_fraction);
00229 
00230                         if (col1->getHitFraction() > result.m_fraction)
00231                                 col1->setHitFraction( result.m_fraction);
00232 
00233                         if (resultFraction > result.m_fraction)
00234                                 resultFraction = result.m_fraction;
00235 
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 
00239         return resultFraction;
00240 
00241 }
